website_summaries.verdict: Versatile solar charging lantern that's small enough to fit in a pocket when it's folded down.
pros: Charges faster in the sun than some other solar lanterns, providing about 30 minutes of light for each hour of solar charging
Works as both a lantern when extended and a flashlight when collapsed
Has a USB port so you can charge mobile devices from the lantern
cons: Not as bright as comparable lanterns
Design may not survive rough treatment

customer_reviews.title: This light will impress you!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for long run Kayaking/Camping trips. Size and weight matters on 2 and 3 day trips. This light was a excellent choice! The solar cell recharges the battery very well, and it has unbelievable battery life. The best part is, it is compact enough to fit in a jacket pocket. I was very impressed with how bright the light is. It is a very good value with exceptional quality. I'm 3 trips in and put gear through extreme conditions. I've dropped this light around 20 times now, and it never fails. I've even used it when my power was out at the house for hours on end, and it alone lights up a room very well!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: the lantern was a good brightness for about 8 hours then it slowly began ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested it to make sure it would do what the lit said it would do and yes, the lantern was a good brightness for about 8 hours then it slowly began to dim but was still producing light past 10 hours, at least enough to read by. I have not tried to charge my cell phone, but I can see where it would provide enough power to use your cell phone in case of emergency. I found that the only way to fully charge it is by the USB adapter because solar does not fully charge the battery. As a backpacker and primitive camper, I can see where this would be a great tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hanscom

customer_reviews.title: Bright and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this SO MUCH, but the handle broke off. It's not like you can reattach it when that tiny nubbin pops off. And now I can't hang it anywhere, which negates it's use in many ways (like hanging it from the tent). It is very bright, though. I love using it as a flashlight/lantern. It is awesome for camping and would be cool for backpacking because the solar charge allows you to charge your phone or kindle. As long as you have a way to attach it to a surface or bag without the handle. I bought another for my daughter's survival pack and will continue ue to use this one. I just miss the handle loop.
customer_reviews.author: Electric Elephant

customer_reviews.title: Great Light... but looses shape quick
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea behind this light. It's bright and very functional. However, the plastic on mine has never maintained shape. Once I slowly and carefully pulled it out into lantern mode, it never went back together again. It's still very functional and I'm continuing to travel with it, but it would be cool if the accordion plastic would hold shape when you open it and close it. Maybe yours will. Mine doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: It's also very cool that you can charge your phone
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived I was a little bummed because its small, but when I turned it on, the brightness impressed me. It's also very cool that you can charge your phone...somewhat. The reason I gave it 3 stars however is because I had the thing out in the sun all day, and while it did charge, the light was very weak. When I plugged it into my powerbank it got much stronger. I was hoping the brightness would match purely from solar charging. Maybe I did something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Dan Engel

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite and most useful camping purchases!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these lights a couple of months ago and took it camping and... fell in LOVE. These are AMAZING! I love the versatility of being able to go from lantern to flashlight so easily! And, it's so small and light and charges with a usb cable. Obviously, I'm a fan. So, I bought another one too :)
customer_reviews.author: James Bailey

customer_reviews.title: A Marvel!
customer_reviews.text: Survival Frog absolutely ROCKS. I've used their usb charge AA batteries for some time, and now LOVE this little lantern. What an innovative idea. It's perfect for our home in the country that's off the grid. Love it's multi use though compact design. A marvel! (...and the light from the lantern is nice....not harsh like so many.) Fairly priced product, quickly shipped. EXCELLENT innovator and seller!
customer_reviews.author: NNE

customer_reviews.title: Pleats collapsed the first time I used it, disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The accordion shade pleats pulled apart the very first time I used it. I pulled most of the pleats back into place myself but it’s not right still. The lantern sits lopsided now but still works okay. It charges on my dashboard. It is slow charging but lights for several hours before dimming to nothing. I haven’t tried the usb charger. It’s light weight enough for back packing and serves well for that purpose. I didn’t return it right away as I had it quite awhile before using it. I did not try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: but overall I'm pleased with my purchase and will probably get a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it just in time for Irma. For it's size, it puts out a lot of light. I haven't had a chance to see how long it runs on a single charge, but overall I'm pleased with my purchase and will probably get a couple more so that all my family members can have one.
customer_reviews.author: J Wetherington

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Terrible product. The accordion plastic material is so flimsy it wrinkles up when used as a lantern. The little red indicator light never turns off and just drains the battery. The second time I opened it it wouldn’t latch shut again.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great light from tiny package.
customer_reviews.text: This puts out great light for such a tiny package. It weighs almost nothing and can fit in a coat pocket. Light stays bright for many hours, it would provide enough light to set up a tent or get you through a power out night. The only reason four stars is I'm concerned it's going to fall apart after a short while. Not being extremely careful opening it once could destroy it. Very flimsy plastic in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: jsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for camping and emergency use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light for camping and emergency use. It is lightweight enough for backpacking along with versatility of use as a lantern, flashlight, charge cell phone. I like that it is solar so I dont have to worry about needing extra batteries. It can also be recharged via AC power outlet. I will be purchasing some more as gifts for camping equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light. Very well made and sturdy. Just the right size for carrying anywhere in a backpack or in a purse. It is convenient to use as either a flashlight or lamp. It is bright enough to read by in a power outage. The fact that it is solar means no worries about replacing batteries in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Planning on getting several more
customer_reviews.text: Bright, compact, easy to charge and use. Since I live in the area where the power is shut off to protect against wildfires, I plan to get one for each room in the house. I keep one by my bed, in case of an unexpected blackout. I love the versatility of being able to use it while collapsed or opened to a lantern style. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Best little light
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried out the charging port so I dunno. But the fact that I relied every night, for 2 years, on this little solar powered light that can open to lantern style, or just be a flash light, never changing batteries, never failing me and enduring Every Rain storm and SWFL sun..... I ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little light that is compact and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this solar light 4 stars only because I haven't put it to use camping yet. If it continues to function well, it will earn a 5 star rating. Great little light that is compact and versatile. I especially like the white materal surrounding the light source - it produces enough light without glaring - important on a dark night. I will report back after my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Wild West

customer_reviews.title: great camping gear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back but finally got to go camping this week. Wow, this was a great light and I love how it opened to be a lantern. Easy to recharge and it even charge my Kindle up enough to read the last chapter of my story. I am going to get another!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light Output
customer_reviews.text: First use of these lights was during a 5 hour power outage and they did great. Better light than several other brands of similar size lamps. Not sure about and have not had a chance to really test the solar charging system or use as as a backup power for cell phones. Worth the purchase just for the light though.
customer_reviews.author: B.Bob

customer_reviews.title: It’s a light puck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and small like a hockey puck! This light is so bright and the lantern part rocks. BE CAREFUL deploying said lantern though, it makes a suction sound and collapses the plastic “lamp shade” inward.. it repairs itself but it feel like it could break if pulled too hard. There isn’t really much in the way of instruction, but it’s easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jo

customer_reviews.title: Works great! takes up very little space in my hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! takes up very little space in my hiking pack, the battery lasts all night, and it has a clever way to transform from a flashlight to a lantern! One small issue: the handle/ hanger on top snapped off very easily when I was packing up my equipment, but this doesnt affect the functionality of the light, just means i have to stand it up somewhere, instead of hanging it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Function and Safety during a Blackout !!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the occasion to utilize it yet; but so far I am happy with its' portable/collapsible features and the handle to hang it where ever I may need a bright light, without the need for an electrical outlet or batteries. It is reassuring to know that even during a power failure, the Survival Frog will function at full capacity!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now I need to buy myself one!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law for his birthday along with one of your other survival products right after we experienced 3 earthquakes that could be felt in the Palm Springs area. I love how portable and lightweight each of the products are. Kudos to your company...looking forward to see what else you"ll come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Sweet charger and light
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase. I am supporting a mission trip the Dominican Republic and this will give them light and the ability to charge a phone. Their electricity is limited and unreliable so since they have plenty of sunshine it will fit the bill! Thanks for your great products.
customer_reviews.author: acekayaker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Power Outages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. Our power went off in the evening fore approximately 10 hours. We used this for 10 straight hours. When the power came back on it was still providing usable light. All you have to do is leave it in the sunlight on the windowsill to keep it constatnely charged.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F From Durham NC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support......
customer_reviews.text: I got the light and opened it up to this.........Survival Frog sent me a replacement within a few days.......Very good support, Very good business that didn’t ask a million questions and make me jump through hoops........I have my replacement and the damaged one that won’t stand up straight or shut but the light still works.........EXCELLENT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with usb chargers. This is a very nicely made product. The lamp can be charged via usb as well as a solar panel. Also, this lamp can be expanded. My only wish was if it would have a crank shaft for manual charging.
customer_reviews.author: pchat

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Although the brightness is a bit on the low side, the pocket light is nicely designed with useful features. I haven't tried to charge it using the solar panel yet or used the usb power bank to charge devices, but I will do so soon.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gear for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Small compact, no need to carry extra batteries, two ways to charge this thing and also charges your phone. Also has a light to indicate when solar panel is charging in sunlight. I just leave this in the back seat of my car and it stays charged.
customer_reviews.author: Cha Xiong

customer_reviews.title: easily charged by USB or solar
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised It is very small, yet puts out a very adequate light, easily charged by USB or solar. A little red light comes on so you know it is solar charging. Only weakness: the fold-able light cover is fairly fragile and needs to be handled with care. You can over expand it. .
customer_reviews.author: JWU

customer_reviews.title: Mine Not so Good..
customer_reviews.text: Bright light but plastic folding area is damaged or defective...Plastic collapses to one side and tips over on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyW

customer_reviews.title: This one is absolutely one of the best! There is an awesome difference between a light ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased 14 solar lanterns of different types to provide as gifts to desperate hurricane-ravaged people in Puerto Rico. This one is absolutely one of the best! There is an awesome difference between a light that costs $11 and one that costs $19. If you possibly can, spend the extra 8 bucks. The upgrade is worth far more than the cost.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved, but functions as described
customer_reviews.text: The light works as described. It has 4 rubber nubs, stops, slides (The proper name escapes me) on the bottom that were lost the first day getting it. I covered with tape. Tested the charging capabilities on my phone and after 30 minutes it had added enough power to make a short call.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy

customer_reviews.title: Don't look like photo--shades are crumpled
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these based on the good reviews. However, mine are defective. The shades don't open properly--they are crumpled/collapsed on one side. I tried to call Survival Frog to get help but they don't answer the phone--they force you to leave a message and then did not call me back.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for power outages
customer_reviews.text: Great for power outages, and even charge on a cloudy/rainy day if you put them on the window sill. I've purchased 2 and will probably get a 3rd as well.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the camping kit!
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful when pulling the lantern apart to its full size to make sure it doesn't get disformed, but otherwise a nice product! Super lightweight and takes up basically no room. The flashlight function is really bright. I also like the charging option as a backup plan for hiking. Lasted several hours during our last camping trip and didn't dim.
customer_reviews.author: E. J.

customer_reviews.title: but a very nice compact light
customer_reviews.text: not as bright as I thought, but a very nice compact light . I bought 2 for my tent.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Survival Frog Light
customer_reviews.text: I received my Survival Frog Lights a few days ago. So, I haven't had a chance to try them out. So far, the only problem I've had is extending the light shade/curtain. I feel after I e-mail the company, I will not have a problem. Actually, I am looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Chilton

customer_reviews.title: This is very cool. Charges easily and worked great on my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very cool. Charges easily and worked great on my phone although my phone seems to suck the juice right out of it very fast. Looking at buying a couple more of these
customer_reviews.author: Regina L Floyd

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for camping and to recharge my phone. So far on my first camping trip it worked great! I just hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: it works well, is easy to pack, am able to see pretty well inside the tent with it on. I also use it for outdoor parties.
customer_reviews.author: matti

customer_reviews.title: Just  what  we  needed
customer_reviews.text: We now have three pocket lights. They are all easy to set up , hold a charge for an adequate time , and serve a very useful purpose in our lives. Thanks for making them available.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small and usefull.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is solar powered and last a long time per charge. We lost power for 4 days. During the day this lamp sat in the window recharging. At night it was on in the bathroom to provide light for any midnight trips. The light lasted all night but to be honest, we kept it on low. But it was bright enough to keep us from peeing on the floor. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product. My sister loved it. I was impressed that it had a very bright lite and also a way of charging the device with a solar panel on to to recharge it. Also can be recharged by a small connection to your regular power supply.
customer_reviews.author: God of Thunder

customer_reviews.title: These are really cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for camping and emergencies. They are super cool! has everything you need and is really bright. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carosel75

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives off so much light. It is small and lightweight. I like how you can use it as a flashlight or a lantern. No batteries needed is amazing! Bought it for my husband and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: riane bates

customer_reviews.title: but so far it looks like a fabulous little gadget and I am going on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not really been away from home to truly try this, but so far it looks like a fabulous little gadget and I am going on a three day river trip with it!
customer_reviews.author: judymhenry

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's functional. A little heavier than i want for my ultra-light set up, but it is as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Donny Darko

customer_reviews.title: Never buy flashlight or batteries again!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST solar lanterns ever! I have been giving them to all my friends. Everyone should have one or two for emergencies even if you don't camp. Keep them on your window sill or the dash of your car and you will always have light and never buy batteries again!! It is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Picked up 3 of them. They work great! I also have the plastic lanterns and these seem way more visually appealing. I haven't tried charging anything off it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Velarde

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Solar Lantern
customer_reviews.text: Love this little solar lantern. It is small, collapsible, and has 3 light settings. It will be perfect for my upcoming backpacking trip.
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: ... tried out the lights are really bright and work great, you have a normal light then you hit ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to really try it out because of the weather but what I have tried out the lights are really bright and work great, you have a normal light then you hit the switch again then it gets brighter light, it switch again then light flashes really nice. what I really liked was my Samsung phone battery was low so I decided to try charging my phone worked really nice did the job. Will have to try it out camping this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Lamrouex Jr.

customer_reviews.title: They survived the initial test out of the box and I like them. I haven't used them camping yet
customer_reviews.text: Yea! They survived the initial test out of the box and I like them. I haven't used them camping yet, so durability is up in the air. Plenty bright for my intended use (tent and wandering around the camp-site)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Madib

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid little lantern. The only piece I don't like is the handle, it's plastic. If it was metal, it'd be perfect. Charges pretty well. Using it as a power bank probably isn't worth it, but in guess you can in a bind. A full charge got my s9 about 30%. Again, it is pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this light highly !!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this light.... I'll be buying several more ......HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Drougas

customer_reviews.title: For best results charge fully before use by plugging in to wall outlet
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Performs as advertized. Works well as both a lantern and a flashlight. A bit challenging to open initially, but once you wiggle and flex it to first get it to open, and see where the little lock tabs are, it is easier after that. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are available ,charged and ready for any emergency. .
customer_reviews.text: No battery's to buy. Lightweight and extremely useful while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it definitely works! The lumens aren’t the brightest however it’s more than enough light to keep you from stubbing your toe. All in all I call it good.
customer_reviews.author: US America

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest lantern. It is can be used as a flashlight or lantern and can be solar powered. We have used it several times camping and it is now on our camping check list. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: susan t simpson

customer_reviews.title: Solar powered
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size and the brightness of the light. The fact that it is solar charged is a big plus and that it folds into a compact size is nice also, glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Quintero

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works as vendor states. as been very handy camping etc brought several.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of light, too heavy for my backpacking needs
customer_reviews.author: motherbear

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp - but be careful
customer_reviews.text: It's really lightweight and compact for backpacking. Puts off good light also. Just don't pull up on it too hard otherwise you will ruin the lantern part. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: River Dog

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for camping or even during a power outage
customer_reviews.text: Handy gadget that gives you a nice bright light that can be solar charged and can also help charge your cell phone. It would be handy to have during a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great little lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great little lantern, but you have to be careful when opening or the accordion folds will be destroyed. Liked the solar charger feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Light is exactly as described. It is compact when closed and bright for such a small light.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This product not only works well as designed, but has also exceeded my expectations. StevieG
customer_reviews.author: Steve Galbreath

customer_reviews.title: love these little lights
customer_reviews.text: bought 4 after hurricane Maria. love these little lights. so easy to charge and carry along in a pocket or backpack for use when the lights go out... or never are on!
customer_reviews.author: EMHoke

customer_reviews.title: The lights operate, but the light unit wont open ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried again to open the light unit, and succeed this time because it doesn't twist to open, pulls instead, so all is well, I found out how to open it., and I like it now.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact light
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably bright emergency lantern; we'll keep a couple around for power outages. It came charged, so we haven't tested the solar-charging abilities yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Good amount of light. Difficult to unlock to expand and haven't been able to close and lock it again. Afraid I might break it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Lantern
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used his little Lantern yet because I've got it packed away with other emergency stuff like survival food and first aid kits and, Etc. But it does work because I turned it on to make sure it works and it looks okay to me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's A Winner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these little lanterns. I immediately ordered a second one. After fully charging I left it on for about 9 hours and it was still putting out plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Great light easy to charge in the sun light
customer_reviews.text: Best camp light around. Easy to charge in the sun and works as a carrying light or as a lantern.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beckstrom

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is just overall great. It came fully charged, the flashlight portion is very bright, and the lantern part is perfect for lighting a room or tent.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L.

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the lantern long. I wish I had had it before the last power outage. It’s charged and ready to go now. It produces much more light than candles or flash lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: How long will it hold up?
customer_reviews.text: I really just got this lantern but it looks like just what I had in mind. I have a pocket solar charger but I am not as happy with the size plus this charger has the light built in. It looks sturdy and well built. I don't see anywhere that it is waterproof but I am assuming(hoping) it will operate in rainey conditions.
customer_reviews.author: ann greer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great product wish the charging cord would fit better not the greatest way to charge keeps popping out and hard to plug in
customer_reviews.author: Joseph gibson

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is compact for my bugout bag, can be attached to side of bag for charging, then expands when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kandis

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Light
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Everyone should have at lease one in their backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Compact and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this light is for storage or transport, yet it expands into a decent sized lantern. I don't know yet how many hours of light it will produce on one charge, but I plan to test it out this week. I also plan to get several more as stocking stuffers for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, well designed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, well designed. Multi-functions are awesome in small package. Charged fully in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: stephen berk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This light has lasted me far longer than I expected, considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, handy light source.
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, I charged it with my cell phone charger. (It was night). I turned it on high and ran it all night long. It charges well in the sun and connected to my computer. It is quite compact when collapsed, so it will easily fit in a pocket on your pack. I haven't tried recharging my phone with it yet. It is light and handy for camping or more serious situations. It's a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great to have during power outages...
customer_reviews.text: These are great little solar lights. They are rechargeable. We used them when we had a power outage. Great to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Teddybear4uinak

customer_reviews.title: ... I received what was promised the light is really cool works great definitely a good addition to any vehicle ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick I received what was promised the light is really cool works great definitely a good addition to any vehicle or camping equipment
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness1022

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and works like a charm. I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product that does exactly as it says. Well ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product that does exactly as it says. Well made, and a worthwhile investment that serves well no only for camping but for any blackouts, which given the vulnerability of our electrical grid, may become more frequent. Planning on getting a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Victor LaCerva

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Solar Light
customer_reviews.text: This little light illuminates a room during power outages. It holds a charge well and is easy to use. Highly recommend for the value.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grassia

customer_reviews.title: Great Ambience
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible solar camping light is compact in size but big in ambience.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little item.Worked well with recent power outage we had.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition to Any Pack or BOBag
customer_reviews.text: This little light is great. I am sure I will buy more as needed...
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Practical Lantern for Emergencies, Camping, etc. Very useful and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept-not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and good light. However, once opened it did not close completely or click shut. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light from a compact source.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light from a nearly weightless and compact unit. Ideal for backpacking and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Brainerd

customer_reviews.title: Super compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this light just be gentle when opening it
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: I like the amount of light it puts out
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit flimsy, as one reviewer put it. That said, I like the amount of light it puts out. I haven't tried the phone charger part yet. My frustration came in when I decided to buy several more, and found that the price had QUADRUPLED. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Diedre58

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Used it for power outage in Puerto ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used it for power outage in Puerto Rico during hurricane Maria crisis. It saced us having to search for batteries which were scarse.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great little solar light
customer_reviews.text: After Hurricane Irma left us we were in the dark for 81/2 days. It would have been wonderful to have this, as we had plenty of sun to charge it. The light is nice and bright, but it's quite compact, small enough to fit in pockets. I'm definitely giving these as stocking gifts next year.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to pack and use
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can switch from "flashlight" to "lamplight". It is very lightweight, easy to pack and reliable. It lasts longer than other solar powered flashlights I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love how it can be a flashlight and also a lantern. Light is very bright can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Paula Brady

product_meta.title: Pocket Light LED Solar Camping Lantern & Collapsible Flashlight with USB Emergency Power Bank Charger Great for Tent Camping, Hiking, Home & Auto by Frog & Co.
product_meta.description:
Power Devices, Signal For Help & Light Up Your Campsite

Charge your phone or tablet, light your campsite, AND signal for help from rescue teams. An essential camping gear addition, the Pocket Light's multi-mode settings (2 level bright and super-bright luminous light, SOS emergency signal, USB charging capabilities) make this camp lantern your new favorite survival gear. Compact and easy to carry, we've nicknamed it the Pocket Light because it fits in your pocket. It also clips to your tent for all night light, then solar charge the next day. Keep this rechargeable camping lantern with you in your camping gear and bug out bag to prepare for your next adventure!

The Pocket Light Collapsible LED Solar Camping Lantern by Survival Frog Includes:

 * 1 - 4.8 oz. outdoor collapsible solar light (flashlight, lantern, USB powerbank)

Pocket Light Features:

 * Versitile & Multi-Modes: Three distinct settings: Bright, Ultra Bright, and SOS Flashing. Use as a tent lantern, or collapse and use as a flashlight.

 * Solar Charge:Use the power of the sun. This rechargeable camping light will charge your cell phone, tablet and other electronic devices, and it can also recharge itself in a flash.

 * Pocket Sized & Compact: So compact it fits in your pocket. Telescopic function allows it to fold up to just 6 x 3in -- the perfect size to fit in your camping gear and bug out bag.

 * Hangs In Your Tent: Thanks to its durable handle, you can hang it inside your shelter and use it as a tent lantern, or hang it on a tree branch in the middle of the night for extra visibility.

100% Satisfaction with our 6 Month "Any Reason" Refund Guarantee. Click Add to Cart Now!
feature_bullets: 4.5V SOLAR PANEL: Use the power of the sun. The Pocket Light LED Solar Camping Lantern lasts more than 10 hours on one solar charge, plus it will charge your cell phone, and other electronic devices. But this solar camp lantern can also recharge itself in a flash (Full sun charge in 4-6 hours). Just 1 hour in the sun provides you with 30 minutes of light (low). Includes smart chip, offering protection from overcharging, over-discharging, and short circuiting.

POCKET-SIZED & 2 FUNCTIONS:﻿ Weighing only about 5 oz. this easy to pack & store camping light is so compact, it can even fit in your pocket. Its telescopic function easily allows it to transform from a solar flashlight to camping lantern.

BUILT IN HANDLE & PHONE CHARGER: This emergency solar flashlight phone charger is surprisingly versatile, thanks to its durable handle. You can hang the Pocket Light inside your shelter and use it as a tent lantern, or hang it on a tree branch in the middle of the night for extra visibility. And charge your phone at the same time!

EASILY SIGNAL FOR HELP: ﻿Includes a flashing light signaling feature, making it ideal for emergency camping gear. If you get into trouble, use the multi-function lantern's flashing setting and its emergency signal in order to signal for help from rescue teams. This could easily save your life!
BEST GUARANTEE IN THE INDUSTRY: We guarantee the Pocket Light with our 6 Month "Any Reason" Refund Guarantee. Ships from USA. Click Add to Cart Now!
